articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: Michelle Obama Criticizes Donald Trump at Democratic National Convention
articles.description: At the Democratic National Convention, Michelle Obama criticized Donald Trump for his racist attacks and narrow worldview. She also supported Kamala Harris, emphasizing the importance of voter mobilization. Obama contrasted Trump’s privileged background with that of most Americans and highlighted the significance of hope in political campaigns.
articles.content: Michelle Obama tore into Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump at the Democratic National Convention, criticizing his character and racist attacks that have targeted her and her husband, Barack Obama, in the past. 'His limited and narrow vie... [3874 chars]

articles.title: Kennedy's Potential Endorsement of Trump: A Political Shake-Up
articles.description: Independent presidential candidate Robert F. Kennedy Jr. is considering dropping out of the U.S. presidential race to endorse Donald Trump in exchange for a potential role in a Trump administration. Kennedy wants his political movement to continue and is discussing these plans with Trump. His campaign will address the nation on Friday in Arizona.

articles.title: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz to Address DNC Amidst High Stakes 2024 Race
articles.description: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz, running mate to Kamala Harris in the 2024 presidential race, will address the Democratic National Convention. This event follows President Joe Biden's exit from the race. Walz and Harris aim to unify Democrats against Donald Trump. The convention includes performances by celebrities and endorsements expected to sway voter opinion.
